318516:
Lost horizonts...
Dream in your eyes...
Wispering your name...
Faraway in the wind...

Forgotten lands
Of eternal prophecys
In the nights
write your legacy

Ancient rites
Beyond the throne of times
In your mind
look the final war
...

I see the dark in your eyes
Cry in the sorrow of my heart
I see blood tears in your face
calling my name in yourself

I see the night come to me
Under the maze of death
...

Viven…
En tus suenos…
Nacen…
De tu llorar…

Plata…
...

I am the rain when heaven cries...
I am the embrace beyond the fear...
I am the blood of the fallen angels...
I am the voice...
...

When forest call
And birds fly in my dreams
The silver moon
Shine in my secret world

The stars descents
Embrace the distance earth
Fall in the sky
Beyond the eyes of night

Oh forest light...
Lost in my silver hands...
Look in my dreams...
...

Lejos de la realidad
Entre sombras y oscuridad...
Yacen tus sueños
En la eternidad...

...

The winds of glory rise
Now in my silence
And feel the moonlight cry
In the land of my destiny

The mountains call my name
Far in my memories…
The stars dance in the night
In the dreams of my promised land…

...

When the night fall
And the stars shine in silence
The Magic of the woods
Fly across the sad trees...
Is time to dream forever...
In the night of silver tears...

In the distance
You voice will be listen
Rise your eyes
to the faeryland realm

Is time to sing... in the land of dreams...
...

A long time ago,
Deep inside the old world,
There was hidden a mystic land,
Filled with ancient woods
And deep lakes dreamed by the mother moon's embrace,
Who watched everything from the night's highest peaks…

The winds danced close to their memories
...

S´alça lluny entre records
Les seves parets Amaguen secrets en l´eternitat

Màrtirs del passat
Van cremar-se lluny en la tristor
...

When your life loses the innocence
And the memories write in your days
The time past in the life...
But never open your eyes...

When the sun is descending in the west
And the woods sing in yourself
The time past in the life...
But never open your eyes...

Faraway
In your innocence
Embrace the night
In the eternity
Listening
...

Feel the winds from the silver woods
Feel her cry in your dreams
It´s the legend of eternity...

...

I can see beyond the lost times
And return to the days of the light
When the stars fall in the sky
Of my eyes...

The night...
Embrace my soul
In the memories
Of the past times
Visions...
In the nightfall...
The lost land...
Now...
In my eyes...

...

Autumn...
The cry of the sky
In my cristaline dreams...
The Wind...
Whisper of my heart
Fortress of my soul...
Silence...
The eyes of the sad
Master of my night...
The moon...
Enchant of the woods
Silver light of nature...

...

Cel i terra
Dominen tot el mès enllà
En silenci
Escrit per sempre en el passat

En els teus ulls
Llueix la lluna com el mar
Rera el teu plor
S'hi troba ocult el teu pesar

...

Ojos blancos
Lágrimas del cielo
En silencio
Brotan de tus sueños

Hoy tu infancia
Yace en tus recuerdos
Brilla la luz
Lejos en la oscuridad...

...
